segments.text: My gaze is drawn back to the two children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on that two-step stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed out; it looks incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I am filled with fear that he will tip over at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems so determined, completely focused on the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite surprising he hasn't lost his balance already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below him is just waiting, oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height could cause a serious injury.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the wet floor from the overflowing sink only compounds the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This precarious balance act makes me very uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His ambition for cookies outweighs his sense of caution, it seems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I truly hope he manages to get down safely.
segments.speaker: PAR
